entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -33.8°C

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 32.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 37 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 37 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 55 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
